author: Jacob Dressler
description:
King of the Hill voice actor Jonathan Joss voiced John Redcorn from 1998 to 2009, having taken over during the show’s second season. He later returned for the upcoming revival which will air this year. Sadly, it’s been confirmed that Jonathan Joss has been shot dead at age 59. This shocking news was broken by [...]

The post ‘King Of The Hill’ John Redcorn Actor Jonathan Joss Dead After Being Fatally Shot appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘King Of The Hill’ John Redcorn Actor Jonathan Joss Dead After Being Fatally Shot

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The 2021 horror movie The Black Phone became a surprise horror hit for Blumhouse based on the short story of the same name by author Joe Hill. Because the film was such a hit, earning $161.4 million on a budget between $16-18 million, a sequel was greenlit several years later. Now the full trailer for [...]

title: Ethan Hawke Returns In First Trailer For ‘Black Phone 2’
